resources.string: The World Baseball Classic is the main official international baseball tournament, sanctioned by the World Baseball Softball Confederation (WBSC) and created by Major League Baseball (MLB), the Major League Baseball Players Association (MLBPA) that brings together the national teams of the world.
Cuba, Italy, Netherlands, Chinese Taipei and Panama are in group A for the group phases
Japan, Australia, Corea, Czech Republic and China are in group B for the group phases
Canada, Colombia, Mexico, USA and Britain are in group C for the group phases
Venezuela, Puerto Rico, Republica Dominicana, Israel and Nucaragua are in group D for the group phases
schedule for the group stage, quarterfinals, semifinals and finals
